tooltip.category.enchantoutline.main: The settings for the enchantment glint outline mod.
tooltip.option.enchantoutline.rendermain: A toggle for all features in this mod. Turnning this off stops all enchantment outlines from being rendered.
tooltip.option.enchantoutline.solidcolor: The outline color for any enchanted item or equipment set to "Render Solid".
tooltip.option.item.enchantoutline.size: The size of the outline on items. (arbitrary units)
tooltip.option.item.enchantoutline.rende: Whether the outline on items should be a solid color or the outline glint shader.
tooltip.list.enchantoutline.override.ite:
Overrides all the outline settings on specific items.

Please note that due to a bug with YACL at the time of development these settings got a little crushed. To get labels for override settings, please reffer to the image above.
tooltip.category.enchantoutline.equipmen: Toggles features for rendering equipment (e.g. armor).
Toggles if the outline for eqipment should be rendered or not
The size of the outline on equipment. (arbitrary units)
Whether the outline on equipment should be a solid color or the outline glint shader.
tooltip.list.enchantoutline.override.equ:
Overrides all the outline settings on specific worn equipment items (e.g. turtle helmet, diamond chestplate). Items without a custom equipment renderer will use the item renderer even when worn in equipment slots.

Please note that due to a bug with YACL at the time of development these settings got a little crushed. To get labels for override settings, please reffer to the image above.
